text: James Turpin may refer to: * James Turpin (organist) (1840–1896), English organist, composer and teacher * James Turpin (cricketer) (born 1997), English cricketer * James Wesley Turpin (born 1920s), founder and director of Project Concern International * James H. Turpin (1846–1893), American soldier and Medal of Honor recipient * J. Clifford Turpin (1886–1966), pioneer aviator with the Wright Exhibition Team
title: James Turpin
